name: CandidaDietTips,Recipes,andInsights
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Tune in for candida diet tips, recipes, and insights to make your candida diet successful and enjoyable! Based on the latest up-to-date science behind candida and over 31 years of clinical experience, Dr. McCombs provides daily diet tips, recipes, and insights that you won't find anywhere else. This can be used in conjunction with Dr. McCombs Candida Plan diet, or any candida diet, as a way to maintain healthy levels of candida in the body. You can also purchase The Everything Candida Diet Book here on Amazon to have access to the 150 recipes in the book, along with diet tips and the science behind candida. 

"This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number."

After enabling this skill, say "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing" to hear your Flash Briefing.
